first.name: Roy
first.text: Well well well who do we have here?

first.name: Bob
first.text: Hi! I'm such a big fan. Would you mind to give me your autograph?

first.name: Roy
first.text: OH it is so nice to meet a fan. Where do you want me to sign?

next.name: Bob
next.text: Shut it, candle-man and call me the Extinguisher now
